ThingDef.label: deep jungle polux
ThingDef.description:
This jungle polux tree has adapted so perfectly to polluted soil and airborne toxins that it doesn't even need to remove pollution from its environment.

Plant details: Deep jungle polux trees are a wild plant, and they need minimum terrain fertility of 0.05. Can only grow in polluted terrains. Can be harvested for small amounts of Red Wood. Tree lover ideologies don't much care about chopping down these weird trees.

Based on art by Corndoggy and Motones, https://www.deviantart.com/motones/art/Xeno-Plants-503932885

ThingDef.label: weeping toxberry
ThingDef.description:
A short toxin-adapted shrub with berries so unbelievably toxic that no animal would ever dare consume them.

Plant details:Difficult to move through, it slows down anyone moving over it. It can only grow in polluted areas.

Based on artwork by Rob Smyth, https://robsmythart.com/projects
